content: this cowl is an updated version of my classic kodiak cowl now knit with cozy worsted weight yarn learn the art of brioche knitting with this simple beginner-friendly pattern complete with a free step-by-step video tutorial 1 the pattern offers two sizes but can easily be adapted to create a custom fit of any size you desire **sizing** 2 sizes small regular * neck circumference 24 75 27 5 inches 63 70 cm * length 9 inches 23 cm for both sizes *note 1 sample is size 2 regular note 2 for a larger circumference cast on additional stitches in multiples of 2 for the invisible join in the round cast on an odd # sts * **yarn** worsted / medium #4 - any that matches gauge * ca = 105 110 yards 96 101 meters * cb = 95 105 yards 87 96 meters *sample in the photo uses de rerum natura gilliatt 100% merino woolen - 270 yds 247 m /100g in caramel ca and fusain cb yardage is based off this yarn * *sample in the video tutorial uses ca = big twist value 100% acrylic - 380 yards 347 m /170g in olive green cb = i love this yarn 100% acrylic - 355 yards 325 m /198g in latte * *other materials * yarn needle * stitch marker * removable stitch marker* **needles** us 10 6 0 mm circular needles in 16 40 cm length *or size needed to match gauge * **gauge** brioche in the round 11 sts / 19 5 rounds = 4″ 10 cm 1 https //youtu be/cn4qjocbtxq si=lr4fbpw_of7tmsf2
